titleStmt.title: John Boyle to Charles E. Norris
CWG14190

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.collection: Assistant Adjutant General Letter Book - No. 1 ; 5 Sept 1863 - 2 Feb 1864

body.p:
307
Nov. 17th 3
Capt. Chas E. Norris. U. S. A.
2nd U. S. Cavalry,
Captain,

Your favor to the Governor has been referred to this Department. Sec'y of War Stanton has refused to authorize the organization of any more cavalry regiments in Kentucky and his Excellency -- the Governor -- instructs me to inform you that he has not, at present -- a vacancy to which he could appoint you.

Respectfully
Your obt. Serv't
John Boyle
Adjt. Gen. of Ky.
